Name: Accuracy
Description: How likely you are to hit an opponent in combat.

Name: Adventuring
Description: Your skill at exploring new places. This increases your likelihood of finding items when exploring.

Name: Axe
Description: This adds bonus damage when fighting with an axe.

Name: Bartering
Description: Your skill at negotiating prices. It reduces the price you pay when buying any item from a vendor.

Name: Block
Description: Skill with a shield. If a shield is equipped then the amount of damage blocked is increased.

Name: Block amount
Description: Amount of damage absorbed when a shield successfully blocks

Name: Blunt
Description: Skill with blunt weapons

Name: Caution level
Description: How much detail is revealed of a location before you visit it.

Name: Charm
Description: How likeable you are. It increases the speed of how quickly people begin to trust you.

Name: Climbing ability
Description: The higher your climbing skill then the more difficult mountains you may climb.

Name: Combat
Description: Your proficiency in fighting. The greater combat proficiency you have then the more damage you do with any attack.

Name: Courage
Description: How capable you are of overcoming your fears. The greater your courage then the greater the obstacles you will be capable of facing.

Name: Dagger
Description: Skill with daggers

Name: Defence
Description: Your ability to take physical damage. This combines with your armour to reduce all physical damaged received.

Name: Detection
Description: Determines the chance that you will uncover enemy traps and ambushes.

Name: Devotion
Description: How religious you are

Name: Dualism
Description: How quickly you are able to change your virtue.

Name: Encumbrance
Description: Your ability to fight in combat while carrying cumbersome gear.

Name: Endurance
Description: Number of actions you can perform each day.

Name: Evade
Description: Your ability to dodge enemy attacks. Gives a bonus chance for enemies to miss their close combat attacks.

Name: Explorer
Description: Reveals additional optional tasks which can be performed while exploring.

Name: Faith
Description: Adds a bonus to how effective your spells are.

Name: Fatigue
Description: Reduces the speed at which you become exhausted in combat.

Name: First strike
Description: Increases the likelihood that you will attack first in combat.

Name: Flame damage
Description: How much flame damage you do per attack

Name: Flee
Description: Increases the chance that you can successful escape from a battle.

Name: Freezing chance
Description: Likelihood that an enemy is frozen after being attacked.

Name: Frost damage
Description: How much frost damage you do per attack

Name: Health
Description: Determines the number of health points you have. When your health reahes zero then you fall unconscious.

Name: Huntsman
Description: The amount of information that you can learn from defeated enemies.

Name: Killshot
Description: Damage multiplier added when performing a critical hit.

Name: Knowledge
Description: UNUSED

Name: Lifesteal percent
Description: Amount of life stolen per hit as percent of damage dealt

Name: Lifesteal static
Description: Amount of life stolen per hit

Name: Literacy
Description: UNUSED

Name: Logistics
Description: UNUSED

Name: Luck
Description: A bonus chance of having incredibly good luck.

Name: Mountaineering
Description: UNUSED

Name: Navigator
Description: UNUSED

Name: Oration
Description: UNUSED

Name: Parry
Description: The likelihood that you can parry an incoming attack.

Name: Pickpocketing
Description: Increases the chance that you will successfully pickpocket someone.

Name: Piercing
Description: Skill with piercing weapons

Name: Piety
Description: How quickly you are able to gain the devotion of a god.

Name: Poison amount
Description: Amount of damage enemy takes from poison each turn. Poison generally lasts for 2 rounds unless reapplied.

Name: Poison chance
Description: Likelihood that a poisoned attack will inflict the enemy with poison.

Name: Poison duration
Description: How many turns an enemy is poisoned for.

Name: Potion effectiveness
Description: Modifier for how effective potions are.

Name: Precision
Description: Chance to critically hit enemies. A critical hit always hits for maximum damage and then applies your killshot multiplier to that value.

Name: Recovery
Description: How quickly you recover from poisons and the negative effects of different ailments.

Name: Redemption
Description: For each two levels of redemption you recover one sanctity each day.

Name: Regeneration
Description: For each two levels of regeneration you recover one additional health each day.

Name: Renown
Description: How famous you are

Name: Reputation
Description: The magnitutde of which your actions affect your renown.

Name: Resist blunt
Description: Ability to resist blunt damage

Name: Resist flame
Description: Ability to resist flame damage

Name: Resist frost
Description: Ability to resist frost damage

Name: Resist holy
Description: Ability to resist holy damage

Name: Resist piercing
Description: Ability to resist piercing damage

Name: Resist poison
Description: Ability to resist poison damage

Name: Resist shadow
Description: Ability to resist shadow damage

Name: Resist slashing
Description: Ability to resist slashing damage

Name: Resist unarmed
Description: Ability to resist blunt damage

Name: Riposte
Description: UNUSED

Name: Sanctity
Description: Amount of sanctity you can have.

Name: Sanity
Description: Your ability to resist mind altering affects.

Name: Slashing
Description: Skill with slashing weapons

Name: Speed
Description: How quickly you can attack in combat.

Name: Spell limit
Description: How many spells you may know.

Name: Staff
Description: Skill with staves

Name: Stamina
Description: For each four levels of stamina you recover one additional endurance each day.

Name: Stealth
Description: Chance to avoid detection when attempting to stay concealed.

Name: Storage
Description: The amount of weight that you can carry.

Name: Strength
Description: Your capability of inflicting damage through melee. This is added to your combat skill and determines the greatest posssible damage you can deal in a single blow.

Name: Survivalist
Description: UNUSED

Name: Sword
Description: Skill with swords

Name: Thawing chance
Description: Likelihood that you will thaw each round in combat if frozen.

Name: Trustworthiness
Description: UNUSED

Name: Unarmed
Description: Skill with using your bare hands

Name: Understanding
Description: How much more quickly you level up.

Name: Virtue
Description: How good or evil you are

Name: Vision
Description: How much of the map is revealed.

Name: Weapon affinity
Description: How accustomed to your current weapon you are

Name: Woodsman
Description: Modifier for forest movement.
